title: dEvi shritham
sahitya:
dEvi shrItamSTrAkarALa vadanE



anupallavi



 dEva dEva vandita caraNE divya ratna khashita bhUSaNE



caraNam 1



satyarUpE sudhAmayI tAyE sAratara mahA mahimAtishayE satya sadanE dEvi

 cinmaya sarasa sangIta sAra sukhamayE nitya harikEsha nija sati nirupamAnandE

 rAja rAjEshvari atyanta prEmadi salahau ambA cAmuNDEshvari gauri



caraNam 2



satyamEvOddharAmyaham emba sAratara mahA birudAngitana satya

 vacana sArvabhaumana sarasa sangIta sAra rasikana nitya harikEsha nija bhakti

 nirata nAlvaTi shrI krSNa rAjEndrana atyanta prEmadi salahau ambA cAmuNDEshvari gauri
